creditline: The John R. Van Derlip Fund and funds given in memory of Anthony M. Clark, director of The Minneapolis Institute of Arts, 1963-73
inscription:
Signature and Date; Inscription

Inscription on verso of canvas relining which, according to Ellis Waterhouse, presumably copies what was on back of original canvas: [Sig.r Pompeio Pinx/Rome 1750]
markings:
Marks on verso:

19th century label on stretcher: [John Woodyeare/Aet. 22.1750  Painted at Rome 1750 by Pompeio Bartolomeo].(sic)
title: Portrait of John Woodyeare
